name: Brian Ricks
content: Brian Ricks | College of Information Science & Technology | University of Nebraska Omaha Brian Ricks Brian Ricks, Ph.D. Associate Professor Computer Science email: bricks@unomaha.edu office: PKI 174H office phone: 402.554.4908 lab room: PKI 372 Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=S-C6lf0AAAAJ&hl=en&authuser=1 ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0001-7015-3182 personal website: https://ricks.io note: This profile is pulling in data from Digital Measures.
